targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") AS "idle" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "name" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("weighted_io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "name" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("packets_recv"), 1s) AS "recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("packets_sent"), 1s) AS "send" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /(vlan|eth|ens|bond).*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "send" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^(vlan|eth|ens|bond).*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("err_in"), 1s) AS "recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("err_out"), 1s) AS "send" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /(vlan|eth|ens|bond).*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("drop_in"), 1s) AS "recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("drop_out"), 1s) AS "send" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^(vlan|eth|ens|bond).*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(none)

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from system with key = host
